extracted_playbook.title: Verify Installed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the original DRASimuCAD v1.02.00.00 is installed before applying the patch.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Delta Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the patch from Delta Download Center to fix the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Untrusted Links and Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click on untrusted Internet links or open unsolicited attachments in emails to prevent potential security threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Network Isolation
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid exposing control systems and equipment to the Internet. Place systems and devices behind a firewall and isolate them from the business network.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use a secure access method, such as a virtual private network (VPN).

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
